name: Tree feller
description:
This game is all about chopping down trees and buy new tools to shop trees for now!

I'll work on this page more later, right now this is just a game I made in order to learn 3D game development and actually ended up with a nice concept and main mechanics so after the Brackey's game jam I'll patch up this game and make an actual game out of it!

Have a nice day! 

Bugs, suggestions & feedback is definitely welcome! :)
